channel.title: ClanAOD.net Forums - News and Announcements
channel.description:
Clan or Forum News
Any new topics in here appear on the front page.

item.title: Spooky Ops 3 7/9/21
item.description:
Spooky Ops 3 July 9th 2021 (Friday) 9pm-12am Est
Image: https://i.imgur.com/RNskDz1.png Image: https://i.imgur.com/ygDq5kv.png Image: https://i.imgur.com/OBPXSxX.png
Hosted by :...
item.content:encoded:
Spooky Ops 3
July 9th 2021 (Friday) 9pm-12am Est




Hosted by : AOD_Wegadins and AOD_Liquid-Technique


Greetings my AOD brothers and sisters!
Do you enjoy being scared? How about being scared with friends?
If YES then I have the event for you!



We loved scaring ourselves clueless so much we just had to do it again! You wanted it so here it is!


Come join your AOD friends on a night of screams and jump scares in the incredible horror indie game Phasmophobia. Four-player teams of ghost hunting detectives will embark on missions requiring the use of various ghost hunting equipment such as EMF Readers, Flashlights, UV lights, Cameras, and many more to find and discover many types of spooky entities!



Phasmaphobia can be purchased for the humble price of just $13.99 ($11.89 untill the 8th) via Steam here




Once downloaded "right-click" the game in your library and got to "properties" go down to "Betas" and choose the "Beta Build" ... Not to worry it is very stable! The Beta build will improve quality of life and performance.

This event will take place in the "Misc" games towards the top of TS where multiple channel groups will be created for players. Four-player squads are not required and players can run squads of just 2 or 3 or even by themselves if you're crazy enough! Sign-ups are NOT required simply post a reply to the thread and show up. Noobs welcome!












Hope to see you there!
item.dc:creator: AOD_Wegadins

item.title: Sea of Thieves Pirates Life Showcase Watch Party
item.description:
Hey all!
Today Rare will be premiering A deep dive look into the new Pirates Life and Sea of Thieves update. They will speak about their links with Disney and the Pirates of the Caribbean...
item.content:encoded:
Hey all!

Today Rare will be premiering A deep dive look into the new Pirates Life and Sea of Thieves update. They will speak about their links with Disney and the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise, the elements of the new season, and the exciting new tall tale adventure we have all been waiting so impatiently to learn more about. We have made a special channel in the Sea of Thieves division where we will be hosting a watch party.

The watch party will start at 2pm Eastern today June 20th but we will be streaming and getting hyped up for a few hours leading up to the event. Come on down and find us in the Sea of Thieves division in the watch party channel.



I will be streaming my reaction LIVE as well so if you want to come watch along with us you can watch in twitch at https://www.twitch.tv/aod_thatnavyguy



Or if you would rather watch the event yourself you can find it here on Youtube.
item.dc:creator: AOD_thatNAVYguy

item.title: 'Sus Sunday' "Town of us" mod 6/20 @7pm
item.description:
Image: https://i.ibb.co/jM8YVwZ/2021-05-17-01-21-31-Among-Us.png
Come join us in the Overwatch division for our monthly Among Us game night featuring the "Town of us" mod which adds tons of...
item.content:encoded:
Come join us in the Overwatch division for our monthly Among Us game night featuring the "Town of us" mod which adds tons of custom roles. It plays from a custom game folder on your desktop. Instructions will be added below on how to download this.
Town of us download can be found >>Here<<

Usual AOD CoC applies. We hope to see you guys in Teamspeak for some murder! >:D

Download instructions below
Spoiler

Quote:
1. Create a new folder on Desktop, called Town of Us.
This can be created anywhere and be named anything, as long as this folder is easy to locate.

2. Open Steam, go to Library and locate Among Us. Right click on it, select Properties.... Then, under Local Files, click on Browse....
This opens the folder containing the Among Us application.

3. Delete everything in the currently opened folder.
Don't worry, this will not delete the game. This simply verifies the Among Us folder being entirely clean.

4. On Steam, locate Among Us once again. Right click on it, select Properties.... Now, under Local Files, click on Verify integrity of game files....
This restores all of the game files as a fresh installation.

5. Copy all of the files from the Among Us folder to the newly created folder.

6. Download the Town of Us version corresponding to the installed Among Us version.

7. Locate the downloaded .zip file, and move it to the Town of Us folder.
Usually, this can be found in the Downloads folder.

8. Right click on the .zip file, and click on 7-Zip. Then choose Extract Here.
Something different might appear depending on the file manager being used. Make sure the folder gets extracted in the Town of Us folder, in the same location as the Among Us application. It should look similar to the picture below.

9. Launch the Among Us application that's inside, and start playing Town of Us!
A first launch may take up to 5 minutes, so be patient if it doesn't launch immediately.
item.dc:creator: AOD_Haggis

item.title: Squad's First Competitive Match
item.description: Good morning AOD!! I am pleased to announce that the Squad Division competitive team will be participating, with our coalition, in our first real live Match against a European team called SPG. We...
item.content:encoded:
Good morning AOD!! I am pleased to announce that the Squad Division competitive team will be participating, with our coalition, in our first real live Match against a European team called SPG. We have been working hard and training for this and while there are not many of us, we have been training weekly for these matches. It will be broadcasted live on Twitch TV and I invite everyone to come and cheer us to victory! The match starts at 1:30pm CDT today!

https://www.twitch.tv/gorlami14
item.dc:creator: AOD_Abract

item.title: Watch E3 with the iRacing Division!!!
item.description:
This weekend the AOD iRacing division will host viewing parties for the Ubisoft, Gearbox, Microsoft/Bethesda and Square Enix press conference events.
We will have a dedicated channel in...
item.content:encoded:
This weekend the AOD iRacing division will host viewing parties for the Ubisoft, Gearbox, Microsoft/Bethesda and Square Enix press conference events.


We will have a dedicated channel in TeamSpeak for people to come in an view and discus what is revealed!!


​


Here is the Schedule

Saturday June 12th


3:00 PM EST - 4:30 PM EST - Ubisoft Press Event
5:00 PM EST - 6:00 PM EST - Gearbox Entertainment


Sunday June 13th

1:00 PM EST - 2:30 PM EST - Microsoft / Bethesda Press Event
3:15 PM EST - 4:30 PM EST - Square Enix Press Event


Please come say hello to fellow AOD friends and see what is coming ahead in the gaming industry
item.dc:creator: AOD_DerrickWW
